item.title: U.S. Department of Defense Office of the Inspector General reply to the complaint I filed with their hotline
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-12-14_0249_0800_dod_oig_hotline_20231213-090624_Closed.pdf From: U.S. Department of Defense Office of the Inspector General Subject: Department of Defense (DoD) Hotline Complaint: 20231213-090624/Closed Date sent: December 14, 2023, 02:49 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Vincent B. Le Corre Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2023-12-14_0249_0800_dod_oig_hotline_20231213-090624_Closed.pdf NB: This document is being published for the first time on April 25, 2025.
